title: Get the members of a BC

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. The maximum page size is 20.

parameters.name: user_role
parameters.description: Basic roles within Business Center. Enum values: ADMIN : Admins can manage the Business Center's members and assets. STANDARD : Standard members can only work on the ad accounts they've been assigned to.

parameters.name: relation_status
parameters.description: User's relation to the Business Center. If the invitation to join the Business Center is still pending, or has been accepted. Enum values: BOUND : The request to manage the asset has been approved by the owner. PENDING : The request to manage the asset is pending on the owner's approval. REJECTED : The request to manage the asset has been rejected by the owner.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: relation_status
fields.description: User's relation to the Business Center. If the invitation to join the Business Center is still pending, or has been accepted.

fields.name: user_email
fields.description: User email address. Note : To protect the personal information of members, some email addresses are masked by default. For instance, an email address of user@example.com will be returned as u**r@example.com . You can apply for an allowlist to access the unmasked email addresses of all members. Accessing unmasked email addresses of all members within your Business Center is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative.

fields.name: ext_user_role
fields.description: Advanced role of the user in the Business Center other than basic role.

fields.name: finance_role
fields.description: User finance role. Enum values: MANAGER , ANALYST .

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.
